mean_cn: n. 会见者，面谈者，进行面试者
mean_en: a person who is asking someone questions at an interview.
word_etyma: inter相互+view观察+er人→interview面试+er人→会见者；面谈者；进行面试者
sentence: I was nervous when I found out that there would be three interviewers, but I still  impressed them.
sentence_trans: 当我发现有3位面试官的时候，我有些紧张，不过我还是打动了他们。
